values: 上述的；前述的；特定的；远离说话者的；所提到的；所指的；特指的
（用以强调程度）那么；那样；如此；非常；很；到那种程度；以至于；以致
（引导状语从句表示原因或理由）因为；由于；（引导状语从句；表示结果）以至于；（引导状语从句表示目的）为了；（引导状语从句表示让步）虽然；尽管

word_group.brief_definition: 换句话说, 也就是说
既然那样, 假使那样的话
目的在于, 为了, 以便
那就是；即；就是说；换句话说
随即；接着就；说完那话；做完那事
那一类的；那样地；毫无准备地；马上；不费力地

bilingual.source: Can you see the dog? That's Rufus.
bilingual.target: 你能看到那只狗吗？那是鲁弗斯。

bilingual.source: The branch on that tree is very long.
I know I could pass that test.
bilingual.target: 我知道我能通过那次考试。
那是女王的房子，塔里克！
哦，那是新的科学博物馆。

bilingual.source: That's just the place I'm looking for.
That's the oldest bus I've ever seen!
bilingual.target: 那是我见过的最旧的公交车！

list.abstract: that，英文单词，英式音标为[ðət]，美式音标为[ðæt]，可用作形容词、代词、连词、副词、名词，还可用于固定搭配。

yingyinNormal.en: That's... That's was... Oh my God. That's Fergie baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是… 我的天。那是弗姬，宝贝。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Asher, the warrant... Strike that. Given that... Strike that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亚瑟先生，搜查令，收回那句，考虑到，收回那句。

yingyinNormal.en: That's very pretty, Dolores. Did we write that for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那很美，徳洛丽丝，那是我们预先写好的程序吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And that horrible museum tour? No, I arranged that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而有那次糟糕的博物馆之旅吗？不是，那是我安排的。

yingyinNormal.en: And at that meeting, that's when that photograph was taken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 照片就是拍摄于那次会议。

yingyinNormal.en: That is Mark? Yes. I hate that guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是马克？是啊。我恨他。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why that song had so much power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以那首歌才那么带劲。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not that I'm smart enough. Then what is it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是因为我还算聪明。那是什么原因？

yingyinNormal.en: What is that? That is a new toy for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？给你的新玩具。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that is a mistake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你就错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, tell me about the ethics of that, Counselor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，那跟我说说那件事的道德问题吧，律师。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that hurts. It felt like fire. It was awf...
yingyinNormal.zh: 是呀，那太难受了，像火烧一样，那很糟...

yingyinNormal.en: You still want that baby?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还要那孩子吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my god. Who was that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，那是谁啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Was that place the sun?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那那个地方是太阳？

yingyinNormal.en: Uh-huh, go on. That's it. That's my whole name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 继续。就这样，那是我的全名。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not me! I know!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是我！我早知道！

yingyinNormal.en: And that wasn't fun for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得那不好玩？

yingyinNormal.en: How amazing would that be!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那该有多么美妙啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I will ask for that too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我也想要那个礼物。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (用于某些动词、形容词和名词后引出从句)
用来代替前面已提到过的名词

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 既然那样；假使那样的话

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: pron. 那；那个；那种；就那样

sense_info_list.zh: (用于某些动词、形容词和名词后引出从句)

examination_example.sentence: My dad's words made me realize <highlight>that</highlight> my earnings might not be mine to do with as I wished.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父亲的话让我意识到，我的收入可能不是我想要的。

examination_example.sentence: Neither of them chose the moment <highlight>that</highlight> had transformed them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们都没有选择可以改变他们的那个时刻。

examination_example.sentence: He realised <highlight>that</highlight> something needed to change, and, being a London media type, appointed himself "marketing director for Nature".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他意识到有些事情需要改变，作为一个伦敦媒体人，他任命自己为“自然界的营销总监”。
我认为那是理所当然的。

examination_example.sentence: Even though it is not your style, <highlight>that</highlight> doesn't mean it is bad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这不是你的风格，但那并不意味着它不好。

examination_example.sentence: Now all <highlight>that</highlight> was needed were the parents, but they were absent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么现在所需要的只是父母了，但他们不在。

sense_info_list.zh: 用来代替前面已提到过的名词

examination_example.sentence: Hopefully, all of <highlight>that</highlight> is designed to support humans in their goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希望所有这些都是为了支持人类实现他们的目标。

examination_example.sentence: If you talk about fashion today, you are talking about China-how young designers and models are finally acknowledging <highlight>that</highlight> in many ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你谈论今天的时尚，你就是在谈论中国——年轻的设计师和模特终于在许多方面承认了这一点。

examination_example.sentence: The French take their 35-hour workweek seriously - so seriously <highlight>that</highlight> some labor unions recently struck a deal with a group of companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国人非常重视每周35小时的工作制，以至于一些工会最近与一些公司达成了一项协议。

examination_example.sentence: Work those into your day-to-day life so <highlight>that</highlight> you get a better idea of how they fit in with your schedule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把这些融入到你的日常生活中，这样你就能更好地了解它们是如何与你的日程安排相适应的。

examination_example.sentence: I think my home falls into <highlight>that</highlight> category.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想我的家就属于那一类。

word_usage.usage:
引导限制性定语从句：
The house (that) he lives in was built 100 years ago.
他住的房子是一百年以前建造的。

在以it引起的句子中对某成分加以强调：
It's the early bird that catches the worm.
早起的鸟儿有虫吃。（笨鸟先飞。）

引导名词性从句：
①宾语从句：He promised that he would come and see me.他答应来看我。
②表语从句：All I can tell you is that he gives me some cakes every day.他每天给我一些蛋糕，这就是我能告诉你的一切。
③主语从句：That he broke the glass is quite clear.很显然是他打破了玻璃。
④同位语从句：The news that he was elected was not true.他当选的消息不真实。

引导状语从句，表示目的或结果：
He was so busy that he couldn't spare time playing cards.
他忙得抽不出时间打牌。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: pron. 那；那个；那种；就那样

examination_example.sentence: So I shared with him <highlight>that</highlight> my Dad was on the same journey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我和他说了，我爸爸也在同一条路上。

examination_example.sentence: It's reported <highlight>that</highlight> the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games have been put off until July 23, 2021.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，2020年东京奥运会已经推迟到2021年7月23日。

examination_example.sentence: He took off his expensive watch to hide the fact <highlight>that</highlight> he was rich.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他脱下昂贵的手表，以掩盖他很富有的事实。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>That</highlight>'s an island in the South Pacific Ocean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是南太平洋的一个岛屿。
如果那个梦想实现了呢？

examination_example.sentence: I acted badly in class, and I feel sorry about <highlight>that</highlight> now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在课堂上表现不好，现在我对此感到抱歉。

word_usage.usage:
that在定语从句中作主语时，不可省略。
示例：Mary likes music that is quiet and gentle.
玛丽喜欢轻柔的音乐。

that在定语从句中作宾语时，可省略。
示例：The coat (that) I put on the desk is blue.
我放在桌上的那件外套是蓝色的。

在电话用语中，this指“我”，that指“你”。
如：—Who’s that speaking?——你是谁？
—This is Mary speaking.——我是玛丽。

先行词reason, the year, office等作原因状语、时间状语或地点状语时，that可省略。
示例：We moved here the year (that) my mother died. 
我们是我母亲去世那年搬来的。
